sentences.en: A mischievous cur must be tied short.
A mischievous spark glinted in his eyes.
sentences.cn: 他眼中闪现出一丝顽皮的神情。

sentences.en: Berg tilts his head and a mischievous look crosses his face.
sentences.cn: 伯格侧着头，脸上掠过一丝调皮的神情。

sentences.en: Hard - working medical men may come to be almost as mischievous as quacks.
sentences.cn: 辛勤工作的医生可能变成江湖郎中那样的骗子.

sentences.en: He was saucy and mischievous when he was working.
sentences.cn: 他工作时总爱调皮捣蛋.

sentences.en: He's as mischievous as a monkey!
Margaret was always mischievous and set on her own individual course.
sentences.cn: 玛格丽特总是调皮捣乱，而且一意孤行。

sentences.en: Mischievous little beggars they are, both of them, but talk about keenness!
sentences.cn: 这俩小家伙淘得要命, 可显起积极呀, 嘿!

sentences.en: She rocks back and forth on her chair like a mischievous child.
sentences.cn: 她像个顽皮的孩子似的，坐在椅子上来回摇晃。

sentences.en: The Foreign Office dismissed the story as mischievous and false.
sentences.cn: 外交部驳斥该报道为恶意报道，不符合事实。

sentences.en: The mischievous effects of the recent storm is now being felt.
sentences.cn: 最近这次风暴造成的恶果,现在正在被感觉到.

sentences.en: The mother inflicted a punishment on the mischievous boy.
sentences.cn: 母亲处罚那个顽皮的男孩.

sentences.en: Their sons are noisy and mischievous.
sentences.cn: 他们的几个儿子又吵又淘气。

sentences.en: There was a mischievous twinkle in his eyes.
sentences.cn: 他眼睛里露出淘气的神色.

sentences.en: With that he gave Hung - chien and Hsin - mei a mischievous wink.
sentences.cn: 说时,对鸿 渐 和 辛楣 顽皮地眨眼.

trans.tran_cn: 淘气的，恶作剧的，有害的
trans.tran_en: someone who is mischievous likes to have fun, especially by playing tricks on people or doing things to annoy or embarrass them
